title: Bobbie Burns Creek into Spillimacheen River
river_name: Bobbie Burns Creek into Spillimacheen River
whats_it_like: Lovely class 4 river running. Starts out as boulder gardens, slowly changing into bedrock rapids as the run progresses.
scouting_portaging: Everything can be boat scouted except for the 30 foot waterfall a few km into the run. Easy to scout and portage on river left.
